title: Family of Saudi Arabia's 'most outspoken' political prisoner calls on G20 to hold kingdom to account
description: The family of Loujain al-Hathloul, a jailed Saudi women's rights defender believed by her relatives and advocacy organizations to be on hunger strike, has called on the G20 to demand that Saudi Arabia release the prominent activist.

title: Michigan: What to know about meeting to certify election results
Analyst on if electors can vote against their state's popular vote
description: CNN legal analyst Elie Honig breaks down the likelihood of any of the lawsuits waged by the Trump team changing the outcome of the 2020 election and whether or not electors can vote against their state's popular vote.

title: Sia defends casting a nondisabled actor to portray a person with autism in her upcoming film 'Music'
description: Pop singer Sia is responding to the backlash to her upcoming film that has been criticized for casting a nondisabled actor to portray a character who has autism. And she's furious.

title: Biden's margin of victory widens as Trump's subversion efforts grow more frantic
description: Overturning elections sounds like the stuff of secret deals in smoke-filled rooms, but President Donald Trump's not even trying to hide his effort to subvert the results of the election as President-elect Joe Biden's margin widens to more than 6 million votes.

title: Florida retiree wrestles puppy from jaws of alligator
description: In a dramatic encounter recorded by surveillance cameras, a Florida man chased an alligator under water and rescued his 3-month-old puppy from the jaws of death.

title: Tottenham Hotspur upset Manchester City to go top of Premier League
description: Goals from Heung-min Son and Giovani Lo Celso helped Tottenham Hotspur surprise Manchester City 2-0 and move to the top of the Premier League table.

title: Black women helped push Democrats to the finish line in Georgia. Here's how they can do it again
description: As the nation eyes Georgia with its pair of upcoming US Senate runoffs, a victory for Democrats could hinge on the same Black women who helped flip the state blue in the presidential election.

title: Nigerian army admits to having live rounds at Lekki Toll Gate protests, despite previous denials
Dominic Thiem edges Novak Djokovic in thriller to advance to final of ATP Finals
description: Dominic Thiem needed two monster tie breaks to overcome Novak Djokovic and advance to the final of the ATP Finals, beating the Serbian 7-5, 6-7 (10-12), 7-6 (8-6) in a three-set thriller on Saturday.

title: A satellite that will track Earth's sea level rise is ready to launch
description: More than 830 miles above Earth's surface, a next-generation satellite will launch today to keep an eye on global sea levels.

title: Tucker Carlson backlash tells us something important about some Trump supporters
description: Traitor. Globalist. Sellout.

title: Bodies of rich man and slave discovered within Pompeii ruins
description: Archaeologists have discovered the exceptionally well-preserved remains of two men scalded to death by the volcanic eruption that destroyed the ancient Roman city of Pompeii in 79 AD, the Italian culture ministry said on Saturday.

title: Donald Trump Jr. speaks after testing positive for Covid-19
description: In a video posted to Instagram, Donald Trump Jr. confirmed he tested positive for Covid-19. The President's eldest son and said he was "totally asymptomatic" but would self-quarantine "out of an abundance of precaution."

title: Man rushes into water after alligator snatched up his dog
description: A wildlife camera captured how a man in Florida saved his small dog from the mouth of an alligator.

title: These girls see themselves in Kamala Harris
description: When US Sen. Kamala Harris of California was elected as the next vice president of the United States, girls all over the country saw someone like themselves elected to the second-highest office in the country for the first time.

title: BTS releases new album 'BE', music video trends #1
description: K-Pop boy band BTS dropped their latest album "BE" along with a new music video for the song "Life Goes On."

title: Jason Momoa surprises fan after priceless 'Aquaman' reaction
description: "Aquaman" actor Jason Momoa called 7-year-old cancer patient Danny Sheehan after seeing his reaction to unwrapping an Aquaman toy.

title: Covid-19 won't stop NORAD from tracking Santa's Christmas Eve flight around the world
description: The holidays are going to be a little different this year because of the Covid-19 pandemic, but NORAD says it will be ready to track Santa Claus and his reindeer as they make their annual flight.

title: The world's now scrambling for dry ice. It's just one headache in getting coronavirus vaccines where they need to go
description: Vaccines like to be kept cool, none more so than the Pfizer candidate for Covid-19, which has to be deep-frozen. And that's going to be an issue for developing countries -- and for rural areas in the developed world.

title: What you need to know before you fly on a Boeing 737 MAX
description: The Boeing 737 MAX is back, but not everyone is thrilled.

title: A hiker was 'essentially dead' for 45 minutes -- until a team of doctors revived his heart
description: A hiker who was found in whiteout conditions on Washington's Mount Rainier "came back from the dead," his doctor said, after his heart stopped for 45 minutes.

title: The US recorded 195,000 new Covid-19 cases in a day. An expert says spread is now 'faster' and 'broader' than ever
description: November has been a month full of devastating Covid-19 records in the US.

title: Michigan lawmakers who met with Trump appear to undercut his efforts to overturn election
Almost a million people have allegedly been given an experimental Chinese coronavirus vaccine
'ICU grandpa,' who cradled sick and premature babies, has died
description: "The Baby Whisperer," "ICU Grandpa" and, sometimes, just "Grandpa David."

title: CITGO 6 begin fourth year in detention in Venezuela as families prepare to spend another holiday without them
description: Just before Thanksgiving 2017, a group of six US oil executives were summoned to Venezuela for an emergency work meeting, where they were arrested on corruption charges

title: Fox News mocks CDC guidance for Thanksgiving gatherings
description: Amidst a raging pandemic, the CDC has recommended against traveling for Thanksgiving, while also offering up guidelines for how to safely celebrate the holiday. Meanwhile, prominent commentators and hosts on Fox News have mocked the guidelines offered by health experts.

title: Michigan lawmakers who met with Trump appear to undercut his efforts to overturn election
description: Members of the Michigan state legislature's Republican leadership who met with President Donald Trump at the White House Friday afternoon said they haven't seen any evidence that would change the fact that President-elect Joe Biden won their state.

title: Georgia officially certifies Joe Biden's win
description: Georgia Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger on Friday certified President-elect Joe Biden's victory in the state, formalizing the razor-thin presidential results after a statewide audit confirmed that Biden got more votes than President Donald Trump.

title: Sheriff's court deputy fired after posting photo of Kamala Harris watermelon carving
description: A part-time court deputy with the Oakland County Sheriff's Office was terminated after she was found to have posted a photo on social media showing Joe Biden, Donald Trump, and Mike Pence pumpkin carvings and a Kamala Harris carving in a watermelon.

title: Kenosha shooting suspect Kyle Rittenhouse posts $2 million bail
description: Kyle Rittenhouse, the teen accused in the fatal shooting of two people in August during protests in Kenosha, Wisconsin, was released from custody after posting $2 million in bail, according to the county's sheriff's department.

title: Twitter: Biden will get @POTUS account on Inauguration Day
description: Twitter said Friday it will hand control of the @POTUS account to the new Biden administration on Inauguration Day.

title: A record number of transgender and gender nonconforming people in the US have been killed in 2020
description: More transgender and gender nonconforming people have been killed in the US in 2020 than any year since the Human Rights Campaign (HRC) first began tracking these numbers in 2013.

title: 'Wipeout' contestant dies after competing in obstacle course
description: A man competing on the television competition show "Wipeout" died earlier this week after completing an obstacle course while filming the series, sources close to the production told CNN.

title: Public outrage after family sentenced to three years for killing young woman
description: A Chinese court made a rare move to calm public outrage this week over a controversial murder case involving a young woman killed by her husband and in-laws.

title: DC Comics is introducing its first nonbinary Flash character
description: It's a first for The Flash.

title: Donald Trump Jr. tests positive for coronavirus
Should women be entitled to period leave? These countries think so
description: Sachimi Mochizuki has worked in Japan for two decades, but she's never taken a day off for her period.
